snippet.title: Epic War VI Walkthrough
snippet.description:
→Description
Epic War 6 is the latest sequel of Epic War Games.
In this game you will control heroes with their unique army. 
Train your hero and unlock their units to conquer all mission in all over continent.
Challenge other player in PVP Arena to show how epic you are.
Features:
*6 heroes & 36 units
*30 stages
*PVP Arena

→Instructions
In game.

Background Music: Watch it Glow
Artist: Silent Partner
Game's Creator: artlogicgames & rudy_sudarto

Play the game here: http://www.kongregate.com/games/artlogicgames/epic-war-vi
